entry.tran: 脑子好的；聪明的；善于学习的
entry.def: Someone who is brainy is clever and good at learning.

example.ex: I don't class myself as being very intelligent or brainy.
example.tran: 我并不认为自己是那种非常聪明、脑子好使的人。

means.word_mean: 1. having or marked by unusual and impressive intelligence;
